content:
You've already experienced the convenience of staying in Shibuya! $64 per night is a great deal for a 7-night stay in Shibuya, especially considering the area's popularity.

For future reference, it's worth noting that prices for accommodations in Tokyo can vary greatly depending on the time of year, with peak seasons (e.g., cherry blossom season, Golden Week, and summer vacation) typically being the most expensive.

If you're flexible with your travel dates, consider visiting during the shoulder season (April-May or September-October), when prices tend to be more reasonable. You might be able to find even better deals on Airbnb during this time.

Since you've already stayed in Shibuya, you might want to explore other areas for your next trip. Tokyo has many unique neighborhoods to discover, each with its own character and charm. Who knows, you might find a new favorite spot!

Do you have any favorite spots or activities in Shibuya that you'd recommend to other travelers?
